des: "As long as there is a beer in the house this is a quick and easy recipe without any fancy ingredients. You can find all the ingredients in a standard kitchen!  This batter is great for deep frying white fish. Fresh lake perch and walleye are especially tasty in this beer batter."
ins: In a small mixing bowl add flour, egg, garlic powder, and black pepper. Stir in 1 cup beer (you can add more than one cup to obtain your desired texture).
